pr_title: Closing the close graph prompt exits graph without save

timeline.message: When cancelling or closing the Save Graph prompt, the unsaved graph is no longer discarded

timeline.bodyText: Looks like you've added some random whitespace to the end of this line. It's not a big enough deal to worry about fixing now, but there is an 'on save' option in Netbeans which will prevent this sort of thing next time.
timeline.author: cygnus-x-1

replies.bodyText: That's a good tip. Thanks. Removed this.
replies.author: Auriga2
